activities: US DataVault is Data Security operation.  The only Personal data we capture is what we need for billing purposes.  ALL other data is double encrypted, by the Client, before it is shipped to us for storage.  Once we have the Client data, it never leaves our secured system.  We never, ever sell, trade or in any manner use Client Private data for Marketing or Promo.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the safe harbor framework or EU data protection authorities.
